results.title: BlackRoad announces transparency initiative
results.snippet: BlackRoad introduces RoadView to surface credible sources and highlight bias across domains.

results.title: Government report on infrastructure resilience
results.snippet: A newly released report outlines infrastructure risk mitigation strategies for critical logistics corridors.

results.title: Academic paper analyzes supply chain trust signals
results.snippet: Researchers propose a trust framework to evaluate vendor claims using open intelligence data.

results.title: Independent analysis of global logistics trends
results.snippet: A long-form blog dives into shifting global logistics routes and their geopolitical implications.

results.title: Repository of supply chain datasets
results.snippet: An open-source repository curates datasets for modeling supply chain disruptions and resilience scores.
